ServerRules.Title: Nocturnal Vengeance Server Rules

Rules.Rule: No harassing, name calling or foul language towards other players, moderators or admin.
No looting bases unless the LCB has expired or has been removed by the owner or an Admin.
No building bases within POIs that players like to loot or raid.
Must behave mature at all times.
Max number of trees within a land claim is 20.

Adhere to the following distance rules to build a base near a trader:
200m 400m 500m
If you do not wish to play on horde night, please leave one game day prior.
LCB will be removed after 3 weeks of inactivity; LCB will expire after 21 days.

ServerRules.MoreInfo: Full list of rules can be found on the Nocturnal Vengeance Discord Server: https://discord.com/nocturnal-vengeance
